oai_dc:dc.dc:biography: The interview was recorded on March 25, 2003 with Ramzīyah Muḥammad al-Shanawānī, female, born in 1928 in Jaffa, Palestine. She was a dressmaker.
oai_dc:dc.dc:biographyAR: سجلت المقابلة مع رمزية محمد الشنواني في 25 آذار مارس عام 2003، أنثى، ولدت عام 1928 في يافا، فلسطين . كانت خياطة.
oai_dc:dc.dc:toc: The city of Jaffa and war-torn society. (@ 26:5)
Military occupation, warfare and resistance in Jaffa. (@ 75:3)
